text: Melum, (‘‘tankal virumpukirapati) cila attatcikal avarutaiya iraivanal avarukku alikkappata ventama?'' Enru (ivvakkiramakkararkal) kurukinranar. Atarku (napiye!) Kuruviraka: ‘‘Attatcikal ellam allahvitattiltan irukkinrana. (Ennitamillai) nan pakirankamaka accamutti eccarikkai ceykiravan mattumtan
